17 import actionlib
18 import rospy
19 import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
20 
21 from niryo_robot_rpi.common.rpi_ros_utils import send_trigger_program_autorun
22 
23 # Command Status
24 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
25 
26 # Messages
27 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.msg import PausePlanExecution
28 
29 # Services
30 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger, SetInt
31 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.msg import ExecuteProgramAction
32 
33 
34 class AbstractTopButton(object):
35 
36  def __init__(self):
37  rospy.logdebug("NiryoButton - Entering in Init")
38 
39  self.pin = rospy.get_param("~button/gpio")
40  GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
41  GPIO.setup(self.pin, GPIO.IN, pull_up_down=GPIO.PUD_UP)
42  rospy.sleep(0.1)
43 
44  rospy.Service("/niryo_robot/rpi/change_button_mode", SetInt, self.callback_change_button_mode)
45 
46  # - Publishers
47  self._pause_state = None
48  self._pause_movement_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~pause_state', PausePlanExecution, latch=True, queue_size=1)
49  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.STANDBY)
50 
51  self._button_state = None
52  self._button_state = self.read_value()
53 
54  rospy.on_shutdown(self.shutdown)
55 
56  def __del__(self):
57  pass
58 
59  def read_value(self):
60  try:
61  value = GPIO.input(self.pin)
62  except RuntimeError:
63  return False
64  self._button_state = value
65 
66  return self._button_state
67 
68  @staticmethod
69  def shutdown():
70  rospy.loginfo("Button Manager - Shutdown cleanup GPIO")
71  rospy.sleep(0.5)
72  GPIO.cleanup()
73 
74  @staticmethod
75  def callback_change_button_mode(_req):
76  return {"status": CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "message": ""}
77 
78  def is_button_pressed(self):
79  return not self._button_state
80 
81  def _trigger_sequence_autorun(self):
82  rospy.loginfo("Button Manager - Run Auto-sequence")
83  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.PLAY)
84  _status, _message = send_trigger_program_autorun()
85 
86  @staticmethod
87  def _cancel_program_from_program_manager():
88  action_client = actionlib.SimpleActionClient('/niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2/execute_program',
89  ExecuteProgramAction)
90  action_client.cancel_all_goals()
91 
92  def _resume_program(self):
93  rospy.loginfo("Button Manager - Resume sequence")
94  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.RESUME)
95 
96  def _pause_program(self):
97  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.PAUSE)
98 
99  def _send_pause_state(self, state):
100  self._pause_state = state
101  self._pause_movement_publisher.publish(self._pause_state)
